tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE drug_target_interaction (
    drug_id INT NOT NULL,
    target_id INT NOT NULL,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_strength FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (drug_id, target_id)
);

CREATE TABLE interactions (
    interaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    drug_id UUID,
    target_id UUID,
    interaction_result VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE interaction (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  drug_id INT NOT NULL,
  target_id INT NOT NULL,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  result TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (drug_id) REFERENCES drug(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (target_id) REFERENCES target(id)
);

CREATE TABLE assay_results (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  assay_id INT NOT NULL,
  interaction_id INT NOT NULL,
  result_value FLOAT,
  result_description TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (assay_id) REFERENCES assay(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (interaction_id) REFERENCES interaction(id)
);
